HomePage.faqSubtitle: Clear answers to common questions from kindergarten managers and parents.
HomePage.faq1A: Yes! The Parent App is completely free. For kindergartens, we offer a free starter plan with optional upgrades.
HomePage.faq2Q: Do I need technical experience to use Rowdatee?
HomePage.faq2A: Not at all. The system is designed to be intuitive and beginner-friendly for both school staff and parents.
HomePage.faq3Q: Can I manage more than one class or department?
HomePage.faq3A: Absolutely. Rowdatee allows you to add unlimited classrooms, students, and teachers (depending on your plan).
HomePage.faq4A: Currently, the platform supports both Arabic and English, with full RTL/LTR support.
HomePage.faq5Q: Is there a mobile app for parents?
HomePage.faq5A: Yes! Parents can download the mobile app to track attendance, view reports, and stay connected with the school in real time.
HomePage.faq6Q: Can multiple users access the same kindergarten account?
HomePage.faq6A: Yes. You can create different roles (admin, monitor, teacher), each with their own access and permissions.
HomePage.faq7A: 100%. All your data is securely stored, encrypted, and access-controlled. Privacy and safety are a top priority.
HomePage.faq8Q: Is support available if I need help?
HomePage.faq8A: Of course! Our team is available via email and WhatsApp for assistance, setup help, and training.
HomePage.faq9Q: Can I limit what teachers or monitors can access?
HomePage.faq9A: Yes. Each role has permission settings. Teachers can only access their assigned classes, while monitors have broader access for attendance.
HomePage.faq10Q: Do parents need help installing or using the app?
HomePage.faq10A: Not at all. The app is simple and guides parents through every step. Plus, we provide onboarding tips to help them get started.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy – Rawdatee Platform
Privacy.intro: The Rawdatee platform is committed to protecting the privacy of its users. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal data.

section1.title: 1. Data Collection
section1.note: The application does not request any other permissions except for allowing notifications.

section2.title: 2. Use of Data
section2.text: Your data is used solely to create a user account and enable your access to the platform. Notifications are sent via Firebase to inform you about updates and activities related to the platform.

section3.title: 3. Data Sharing
section3.text: Your personal data is not shared with any third party except for notification services (Firebase).

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.text1: Data is stored in a MongoDB database.
section4.text2: Passwords are not stored. Instead, temporary one-time passwords (OTPs) are encrypted and valid for a short period of time.
section4.text3: All communications are protected via HTTPS.

section5.title: 5. User Rights
section5.text: You can request deletion of your personal data or obtain a copy of it by contacting us.

section6.title: 6. Contact Information
section6.text: If you have any questions, you can contact us at:
